articles.title: Global stock markets rise, U.S. yields fall ahead of employment data - Reuters
articles.description: Global equity markets rose while U.S. yields were lower on Thursday after lower-than-expected private payrolls data stirred hopes that the American economy was likely cooling and the Federal Reserve might be persuaded to modify its aggressive stance on intere…

articles.title: Nigerian man kills self after shooting wife, grandmother in US - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: A Nigerian man, Obinna Igbokwe, on Thursday committed suicide after shooting his wife, Tangela, and grandmother in Texas, United States of America.
articles.content:
